sentence.Network_en: Shifting an Internet friendship into the real world trickier a knuckleball.
sentence.Network_cn: 将网络友谊搬到现实世界要比投蝴蝶球更加困难.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 6指关节球(knuckleball)这是一种很不容易控制的球，它会漂浮，又叫弹指球、蝴蝶球。 希望对你有帮助。

means.word_mean: 1. a baseball pitch thrown with little speed or spin

auth_sentence.content: Knuckleball pitchers seldom need to ice their arms after working.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Knuckleball pitchers seldom need to ice their arms after working.

auth_sentence.content: I said, Before you let him go, I'd like to see him on the mound, 'cause he's got a good knuckleball.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I said, Before you let him go, I'd like to see him on the mound, 'cause he's got a good knuckleball.

auth_sentence.content: "I just hope that one day there may be a home for aged knuckleball pitchers to go to," he said.
